metadata.title: CVE-2016-5265 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Mozilla Firefox before 48.0 and Firefox ESR 45.x before 45.3 allowuser-assisted remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy, andconduct Universal XSS (UXSS) attacks or read arbitrary files, by arrangingfor the presence of a crafted HTML document and a crafted shortcut file inthe same local directory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5265` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
